mean_cn: n.瘟疫；灾难；麻烦；  v.折磨；烦扰；造成麻烦
mean_en: any infectious disease that kills a lot of people; a disease spread by rats that causes fever, swellings on the body and usually death
sentence: In medieval Europe, doctors wore beak-like masks to keep themselves from the plague.
sentence_trans: 在中世纪的欧洲，医生们戴着鸟嘴状的面具使自己远离瘟疫。
